newsitem.title: EU: EP Foreign Affairs Committee agenda - June 9.
newsitem.headline: EP Foreign Affairs Committee agenda - June 9.

text.p: Committee on Foreign Affairs, Security and Defence Policy [[ Monday 09 June 1997 ]] Public Meeting (1) 0.0 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE 222.638 ) 2. Chairman's announcements 3. Protocol to the partnership and cooperation agreement between the EC and Russia (T04900) AVC96106 COM(96)0150 C4-0245/97 + POLI Fond R CARRERE D'ENCAUSSE H (UPE) (PE218.998 ) - Adoption of draft report 4. Activities of the joint parliamentary committees and interparliamentary delegations 5. Date of next meeting (PE/I/OJ/97-014/EXT ) 5.1 5.2
[FOOTNOTES]1. ) Unless decided otherwise. - FIN - END OF DOCUMENT.
